Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, one and all, to this season's <RED>Fashion
Fiesta</RED>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to introduce the amateur designers
who will be showing off their latest creations
today.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME3>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #<MOJI3>, <CHARANAME3>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
These four will be today's contestants.
<PAGE>
Models will display the outfits designed by the
participants. The designer of the outfit judged
the most fashionable will be the winner.
<PAGE>
Contestants, will you please get your models
ready? Thank you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I have the honor of introducing our guest
judge...
<PAGE>
A round of applause for the world-renowned
fashionista and art critic, Del Cosa!

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Salutations, ladies and gentlemen. Del Cosa
here. It's a pleasure, I'm sure.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems our contestants are ready. Now, let the
fashion fiesta commence!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
First up is Entry #1, an outfit by <MOJI0>
Farm's <CHARANAME0>. <CHARANAME0>, if
you please!

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Very lovely! The <MOJI1> works
splendidly well together with the <MOJI2> and
the <MOJI4>.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Beautiful. Simply beautiful. This combination
seems tailor-made for the season.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Interesting! It's an avant-garde concept. The
model really pulls it off, though.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrmm...I see. Not bad. A bit of a "safe" choice,
but stylish nonetheless.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not bad. The <MOJI1>'s colors
are well-chosen. The <MOJI4>
works well as an accent, too.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... A little plain, but still chic and stylish. It
definitely shows all the hallmarks of a mature
taste.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm. Well. That's certainly...something. It's quite
the...er...interesting choice.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! How fabulous! Now this is Art! With a
capital A, even!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Next up is Entry #2, an outfit by <MOJI0>
Farm's <CHARANAME1>. <CHARANAME1>, if
you please!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Next up is Entry #3, an outfit by <MOJI0>
Farm's <CHARANAME2>. <CHARANAME2>, if
you please!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
And finally, Entry #4, an outfit by <MOJI0>
Farm's <CHARANAME3>. <CHARANAME3>, if
you please!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Entry #<MOJI3>, an outfit
by <CHARANAME3>. <CHARANAME3>, if you
please!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That wraps up the show portion of the Fashion
Fiesta to a close. Next, we'll announce the
results of the judging.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The winner of this season's Fashion Fiesta is...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>!
Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHARANAME4>! Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 2nd place, <CHARANAME1>!
In 3rd place, <CHARANAME2>!
In 4th place, <CHARANAME3>!
<PAGE>
It was difficult to choose from so many trend-
setting outfits, but these are the final results.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once again, congratulations to our winner,
<CHARANAME4>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Without further ado, let us begin the awards
ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will our winner, <CHARANAME4>, please step
forward?

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! Your taste in fashion is a
visionary Shangri-la amidst a storm of trends
and fads. Simply fabulous!
<PAGE>
Allow me to proudly present your grand prize,
this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Do keep up the inspiring work! Your fashions
bring such vivid color and liveliness to this
town.

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations! Your taste in fashion is a
visionary Shangri-la amidst a storm of trends
and fads. Simply fabulous!
<PAGE>
Allow me to proudly present your grand prize, an
<BLUE>Odd Eye</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Do keep up the inspiring work! Your fashions
bring such vivid color and liveliness to this
town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That is all for this season's <RED>Fashion Fiesta</RED>. Thank
you for coming out today, everyone. We hope to
see you again next time!

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With your victory today, your fashion brand has
been raised to <RED><ITEMNAME1></RED>!

<FACE_DELCOSSA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now all of your clothing and accessories will
ship for a slightly higher price. Congratulations! I
see fashion fame in your future.
